string: Pikku-Kalle meni kauppaan. Yht'äkkiä kauppa liikkui, ja Pikku-Kalle olikin väärässä kohdassa.

Yeah, lately I also had to resort to the good ol' "grab-the-cat-and-put-the-fucking-medicine-inside-it" method after many, many tries with all sorts smart tricks etc.

You're right about rewarding the cat after you've forced the pill in him. Hopefully, after a few times he'll catch on and just submit for the extra noms and attentionz. Mine did.

My other cat eats any pill if it's covered with something tasty, however. Sometimes even just as-is.
